text_1: You can click the Sidebar button on the top right or if you're on mobile and the sidebar would be annoying, you can click the Chapters menu.
Mediánové platy podľa miest v SR: Median salaries by city the Slovak Republic
Platy na pozíciach v SR: Salaries for positions in the Slovak Republic
All of Slovakia... or choose a city.
Density HeatMap podľa typu nehnutelnosti: Density HeatMap by property type and district.
DisPlot - vyjadrenie ceny vs. plochy obj: DisPlot - expression of price vs. area of the object on the XY coordinate axis
Platy podľa odvetvia v SR: Salaries by industry in the Slovak Republic
Distribúcia mzdy podľa počtu obsadených: Wage distribution by number of occupied positions / respondents
Porovnanie celkových platov muži / ženy: Comparison of total salaries male / female
Počet objektov na predaj v ponuke: Number of objects for sale on offer
Počet ponúk na predaj podľa typu nehnute: Number of offers for sale by property type and county.
Ceny nájmov vybraných nehnuteľností podľ: Rental prices of selected properties by state
Rental prices of selected properties by state.
Vývoj úrokových sadzieb na hypotéky 3r f: Long-term interest rates on 3-year fixed mortages
Mapa Slovenska: mzdy v regiónoch: Map of Slovakia: wages in regions
Mapa Slovenska: pomer ceny nehnutelnosti: Map of Slovakia: property price to wage ratio
Mapa nám vyjadruje, aká je priemerná mzd: The map tells us what the average wage is in the regions.
Ratio of wages and housing prices by district.
Mapa nám vyjadruje, koľko priemerných ro: The map tells us how many average annual salaries in a given region you need to be able to buy an average property of a given type.
Histogram nám vyjadruje, koľko zamestnan: The histogram tells us how many employees are in a given salary range.
Po vyradení outlierov na základe pracovn:
After eliminating outliers based on job position.
The histogram tells us how many jobs with a median salary are in a given salary range.
